verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, if thou art become surety <S%H6148><s%> for thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, If thou hast stricken <S%H8628><s%> thy hands <S%H3709><s%> for a stranger <S%H2114><s%>;
Thou art snared <S%H3369><s%> with the words <S%H561><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, Thou art taken <S%H3920><s%> with the words <S%H561><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

Do <S%H6213><s%> this now <S%H645><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> thyself <S%H935><s%>, Seeing thou art come into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>: Go <S%H3212><s%>, humble <S%H7511><s%> thyself <S%H7292><s%>, and importune thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>;
Give <S%H5414><s%> not sleep <S%H8142><s%> to thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, Nor slumber <S%H8572><s%> to thine eyelids <S%H6079><s%>;
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> thyself as a roe <S%H6643><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the hunter <S%H6833><s%>, And as a bird from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the fowler <S%H3353><s%>.
Go <S%H3212><s%> to the ant <S%H5244><s%>, thou sluggard <S%H6102><s%>; Consider <S%H7200><s%> her ways <S%H1870><s%>, and be wise <S%H2449><s%>:
Which having no chief <S%H7101><s%>, Overseer <S%H7860><s%>, or ruler <S%H4910><s%>,
Provideth <S%H3559><s%> her bread <S%H3899><s%> in the summer <S%H7019><s%>, And gathereth <S%H103><s%> her food <S%H3978><s%> in the harvest <S%H7105><s%>.
How long wilt thou sleep <S%H7901><s%>, O sluggard <S%H6102><s%>? When wilt thou arise <S%H6965><s%> out of thy sleep <S%H8142><s%>?
Yet a little <S%H4592><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>, a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber <S%H8572><s%>, A little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to sleep <S%H7901><s%>:
So shall thy poverty <S%H7389><s%> come <S%H935><s%> as a robber <S%H1980><s%>, And thy want <S%H4270><s%> as an armed <S%H4043><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.
A worthless <S%H1100><s%> person <S%H120><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>, Is he that walketh <S%H1980><s%> with a perverse <S%H6143><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>;
That winketh <S%H7169><s%> with his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that speaketh <S%H4448><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%>, That maketh <S%H3384><s%> signs with his fingers <S%H676><s%>;
In whose heart <S%H3820><s%> is perverseness <S%H8419><s%>, Who deviseth <S%H2790><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> continually <S%H6256><s%>, Who soweth <S%H7971><s%> discord <S%H4066><s%>.
Therefore shall his calamity <S%H343><s%> come <S%H935><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%>; On a sudden <S%H6621><s%> shall he be broken <S%H7665><s%>, and that without remedy <S%H4832><s%>.
There are six <S%H8337><s%> things which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hateth <S%H8130><s%>; Yea <S%H7651><s%>, seven which are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto him <S%H5315><s%>:
Haughty <S%H7311><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>, And hands <S%H3027><s%> that shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>;
A heart <S%H3820><s%> that deviseth <S%H2790><s%> wicked <S%H205><s%> purposes <S%H4284><s%>, Feet <S%H7272><s%> that are swift <S%H4116><s%> in running <S%H7323><s%> to mischief <S%H7451><s%>,
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> that uttereth <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>, And he that soweth <S%H7971><s%> discord <S%H4090><s%> among brethren <S%H251><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, keep <S%H5341><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, And forsake <S%H5203><s%> not the law <S%H8451><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>:
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them continually <S%H8548><s%> upon thy heart <S%H3820><s%>; Tie <S%H6029><s%> them about thy neck <S%H1621><s%>.

When thou walkest <S%H1980><s%>, it shall lead <S%H5148><s%> thee <S%H7901><s%>; When thou sleepest, it shall watch <S%H8104><s%> over thee <S%H6974><s%>; And when thou awakest, it shall talk with thee <S%H7878><s%>.

For the commandment <S%H4687><s%> is a lamp <S%H5216><s%>; And the law <S%H8451><s%> is light <S%H216><s%>; And reproofs <S%H8433><s%> of instruction <S%H4148><s%> are the way <S%H1870><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>:
To keep <S%H8104><s%> thee from the evil <S%H7451><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, From the flattery <S%H2513><s%> of the foreigner <S%H5237><s%>'s tongue <S%H3956><s%>.
Lust <S%H2530><s%> not after her beauty <S%H3308><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>; Neither let her take <S%H3947><s%> thee with her eyelids <S%H6079><s%>.

For on account of <S%H1157><s%> a <S%H802><s%> harlot <S%H2181><s%> a man is brought to a piece <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>; And the adulteress <S%H802><s%> hunteth <S%H6679><s%> for the precious <S%H3368><s%> life <S%H5315><s%>.
Can a man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H2846><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, And his clothes <S%H899><s%> not be burned <S%H8313><s%>?
Or can one <S%H376><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> upon hot coals <S%H1513><s%>, And his feet <S%H7272><s%> not be scorched <S%H3554><s%>?
So he that goeth in <S%H935><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; Whosoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> her shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>.
Men do not despise <S%H936><s%> a thief <S%H1590><s%>, if he steal <S%H1589><s%> To satisfy <S%H4390><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> when he is hungry <S%H7456><s%>:
But if he be found <S%H4672><s%>, he shall restore <S%H7999><s%> sevenfold <S%H7659><s%>; He shall give <S%H5414><s%> all the substance <S%H1952><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>.

He that committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>: He doeth <S%H6213><s%> it who would destroy <S%H7843><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Wounds <S%H5061><s%> and dishonor <S%H7036><s%> shall he get <S%H4672><s%>; And his reproach <S%H2781><s%> shall not be wiped away <S%H4229><s%>.
For jealousy <S%H7068><s%> is the rage <S%H2534><s%> of a man <S%H1397><s%>; And he will not spare <S%H2550><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%>.
He will not regard <S%H5375><s%> any ransom <S%H3724><s%>; Neither will he rest content <S%H14><s%>, though thou givest many <S%H7235><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%>.
